Test Case Title: Verify search for a valid movie
Pre Condition: User is logged into the account
Steps to Execute:
1. Enter 'Inception' in the search bar.
2. Press 'Enter.'
Expected Result: 'Inception' appears in the search results with its details.

Test Case Title: Verify search for a valid series
Pre Condition: User is logged into the account
Steps to Execute:
1. Enter 'Stranger Things' in the search bar.
2. Press 'Enter.'
Expected Result: 'Stranger Things' appears in the search results with its details.

Test Case Title: Verify search for a valid genre
Pre Condition: User is logged into the account
Steps to Execute:
1. Enter 'Comedy' in the search bar.
2. Press 'Enter.'
Expected Result: Movies and series under 'Comedy' appear in the search results.

Test Case Title: Verify search with a partial movie name
Pre Condition: User is logged into the account
Steps to Execute:
1. Enter 'Inc' in the search bar.
2. Press 'Enter.'
Expected Result: Results related to 'Inc' (e.g., 'Inception') are displayed.

Pre Condition: User is logged into the account
Steps to Execute:
1. Enter 'Comedy Romance' in the search bar.
2. Press 'Enter.'
Expected Result: Movies and series matching 'Comedy Romance' appear in the results.

Pre Condition: User is logged into the account
Steps to Execute:
1. Enter '#' in the search bar.
2. Press 'Enter.'
Expected Result: An appropriate message ('No results found') is displayed.

Pre Condition: User is logged into the account
Steps to Execute:
1. Enter 'iNcePtiOn' in the search bar.
2. Press 'Enter.'
Expected Result: Results for 'Inception' are displayed.

Pre Condition: User is logged into the account
Steps to Execute:
1. Enter 'Película' in the search bar.
2. Press 'Enter.'
Expected Result: Results related to the keyword in the specified language are displayed.

Pre Condition: User is logged into the account
Steps to Execute:
1. Enter 'Inception ' (with space at the end) in the search bar.
2. Press 'Enter.'
Expected Result: Results for 'Inception' are displayed, ignoring the trailing spaces.

Test Case Title: Verify search for titles with numbers
Pre Condition: User is logged into the account
Steps to Execute:
1. Enter 'Stranger Things 2' in the search bar.
2. Press 'Enter.'
Expected Result: Results for 'Stranger Things 2' are displayed.

Test Case Title: Verify no results for an invalid search term
Pre Condition: User is logged into the account
Steps to Execute:
1. Enter 'xyz123' in the search bar.
2. Press 'Enter.'
Expected Result: 'No results found' message is displayed.

Test Case Title: Verify search with an empty input
Pre Condition: User is logged into the account
Steps to Execute:
1. Leave the search bar empty.
2. Press 'Enter.'
Expected Result: 'Please enter a search term' message is displayed.

Pre Condition: User is logged into the account
Steps to Execute:
1. Enter only spaces in the search bar.
2. Press 'Enter.'
Expected Result: 'Please enter a valid search term' message is displayed.

Test Case Title: Verify search with an excessively long invalid term
Pre Condition: User is logged into the account
Steps to Execute:
1. Enter a very long invalid term (e.g., 500+ characters).
2. Press 'Enter.'
Expected Result: 'No results found' message is displayed.

Test Case Title: Verify handling of potential SQL injection
Pre Condition: User is logged into the account
Steps to Execute:
1. Enter '1=1; DROP TABLE' in the search bar.
2. Press 'Enter.'
Expected Result: Input is sanitized, and 'No results found' message is displayed.

Pre Condition: User is logged into the account
Steps to Execute:
1. Enter '<script>alert('XSS')</script>' in the search bar.
2. Press 'Enter.'
Expected Result: Input is sanitized, and 'No results found' message is displayed.

Pre Condition: User is logged into the account
Steps to Execute:
1. Enter '12345' in the search bar.
2. Press 'Enter.'
Expected Result: 'No results found' message is displayed.

Pre Condition: User is logged into the account
Steps to Execute:
1. Enter '@$%&*!' in the search bar.
2. Press 'Enter.'
Expected Result: 'No results found' message is displayed.

Pre Condition: User is logged into the account
Steps to Execute:
1. Enter 'Inceptin' (typo) in the search bar.
2. Press 'Enter.'
Expected Result: System suggests or displays results for 'Inception.'

Pre Condition: User is logged into the account
Steps to Execute:
1. Enter 'こんにちは' (Japanese text) in the search bar.
2. Press 'Enter.'
Expected Result: 'No results found' message is displayed or related results appear if supported.
